name: Fix My Car: Custom Mods LITE
name_original: Fix My Car: Custom Mods LITE
description:
Tweak a stock car! Customize it, lower it and mod it until the car becomes a fly street racer fully upgraded with aftermarket parts!

* This is the LITE/FREE version of the game. It is playable to the end but only by watching ads or by unlocking IAP. Purchase the FULL version of the game or unlock IAP to remove all ads! *

In this automotive project you'll have fun discovering your auto, mechanical skills while learning about performance upgrades and how custom car modifications are installed in the real world.

Find tools, use them, order parts and bring the vehicle to a racing quality using a private, professional body shop. This is where you come to work on one of the coolest cars, and you'll do it for the love of cars; it's fun and entertaining! If you like our original Fix My Car game, this game will not disappoint.

FEATURES:

+ 60+ objectives and upgrades to do! This is our classic Fix My Car game!

+ Dozens of tools and cool after-market parts to find and install!

+ Perform dozens of jobs, ranging from basic routine maintenance to outrageous performance mods!

+ Explore cool environments like your own private garage and private loft apartment!

+ Built-in hint system so you never get stuck!

+ All hints and objectives available in FULL version, LITE version requires unlocking with reward videos or a one-time in app purchase.
